articles.title: Fully vaccinated Americans could be allowed into Canada by mid-August, Trudeau says - CBC.ca
articles.description: The federal government is aiming to allow fully vaccinated U.S. citizens and permanent residents into Canada again by as early as mid-August, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau said late Thursday.
articles.content: Canada is getting ready to welcome the world again, Prime Minister Justin Trudeau quietly indicated late Thursday as his office disclosed a target of mid-August for when the border might reopen for f… [+3669 chars]
